Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2013 06:29PM michele830 wrote: I just got my pathology report back.   Surgeon said if nodes are negative then no chemo.  Today she says - nodes are negative amrgins are clean but her2+ - so you will need chemo.  I'm angy. I don't know what to do with the anger.  Been enraged since my biopsy.  Don't know how to do this. I'm 52 and single with a daughter in college. Im on my own.  How do you prepare for this?  Please help me.  I can't stop crying.
Posts.Title: In shock bennymuffins websister
